mapper.select: select ORDERID, REMARKS, PURCHASE, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, LOGISTICSID, FLAG, SUPPORTPRINT, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYNO, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYID, CONTET, ALISHOPID, LOGISTICSORDERNO, STATUS, LOGISTICSTRACE from db_alibbporder where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ORDERID, REMARKS, PURCHASE, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, LOGISTICSID, FLAG, SUPPORTPRINT, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYNO, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYID, CONTET, ALISHOPID, LOGISTICSORDERNO, STATUS, LOGISTICSTRACE from db_alibbporder

ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
PURCHASE = #{purchase,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and

LOGISTICSID = #{logisticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

COMPANYPHONE = #{companyphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

ALISHOPID = #{alishopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LOGISTICSORDERNO = #{logisticsorderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LOGISTICSTRACE = #{logisticstrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
